newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss launch three-month money market claims.
newsitem.headline: Swiss launch three-month money market claims.

text.p: The Swiss federal government is issuing three-month money market claims to be paid for on August 7, the Swiss National Bank said.
The allocation follows the end of subscriptions on August 5.
The previous issue of three-month claims, paid for on July 31, raised 859.10 million francs and was priced at 98.418 percent to yield 1.590 percent annually.
